name: Traveler
description:
Traveler

Development Story

Heyo 🙂 Suu here.

I'm a nerd from switzerland.

I love gaming ever since, so... I decided to create my own little game (well... now it's no more little tho) - Working on Traveler since some years now.
It is inspired by the game "Uru" - an old game about traveling to different worlds, solving puzzles to go on.
And since I'm a really big fan of RPG's, I thought I could combine the fighting-stuff with the puzzle-stuff and well.... That happened. 🙂

What is the game about?

  • Traveler contains right now 8 (*1) different themed worlds you are able to explore by your own
  • Traveler is an open world game with the focus on exploring and solving quests
  • Traveler is an rpg game
  • Key elements of traveler are magic, quests, world bosses and exploration goals

*1: Please refer to the early access section to see our plans
